    Interface for response senders

        void send(IResponse responseObject,
          IObject environment,
          IChannelHandler ctx)
   throws ResponseSendingException
        Method for sending response to client
        Parameters:
        responseObject - Object with content of the response
        environment - Environment of the message processor
        ctx - Channel handler from endpoint
        Throws:
        ResolutionException - if there are some problems on resolving dependencies
        ResponseSendingException
